channel.title: Upcoming OECD Publication Embargoes and Launches
channel.description: A list of dates and publications

item.title: OECD Handbook on the Compilation of Household Distributional Results on Income, Consumption and Saving in Line with National Accounts Totals
item.description: OECD Handbook on the Compilation of Household Distributional Results on Income, Consumption and Saving in Line with National Accounts Totals by Statistics and Data Directorate has an embargo on Monday 29 January 2024 at 9:00.

item.title: Scaling-up infrastructure investment to strengthen sustainable development in Brazil
item.description: Scaling-up infrastructure investment to strengthen sustainable development in Brazil by Economics Department has an embargo on Wednesday 31 January 2024 at 7:00.

item.title: Independent fiscal institutions - A typology of OECD institutions and a roadmap for Latin America
item.description: Independent fiscal institutions - A typology of OECD institutions and a roadmap for Latin America by Economics Department has an embargo on Wednesday 31 January 2024 at 7:00.

item.title: Pillar One - Amount B - Inclusive Framework on BEPS
item.description: Pillar One - Amount B - Inclusive Framework on BEPS by Centre for Tax Policy and Administration has an embargo on Thursday 1 February 2024 at 11:00.
item.oe:directorate: Centre for Tax Policy and Administration

item.title: Pilier Un - Montant B - Cadre Inclusif sur le BEPS
item.description: Pilier Un - Montant B - Cadre Inclusif sur le BEPS by Centre for Tax Policy and Administration has an embargo on Thursday 1 February 2024 at 11:00.
item.oe:directorate: Centre for Tax Policy and Administration

item.title: Impact Evaluation of Training and Wage Subsidies for the Unemployed in Greece
item.description: Impact Evaluation of Training and Wage Subsidies for the Unemployed in Greece by Directorate for Employment, Labour and Social Affairs has an embargo on Thursday 8 February 2024 at 9:00.

item.title: OECD Services Trade Restrictiveness Index - Policy Trends up to 2024
item.description: OECD Services Trade Restrictiveness Index - Policy Trends up to 2024 by Trade and Agriculture Directorate has an embargo on Monday 12 February 2024 at 11:00.

item.title: Securing Medical Supply Chains in a Post-Pandemic World
item.description: Securing Medical Supply Chains in a Post-Pandemic World by Directorate for Employment, Labour and Social Affairs has an embargo on Friday 23 February 2024 at 9:30.
item.oe:directorate: Directorate for Employment, Labour and Social Affairs

item.title: OECD Economic Surveys: Egypt 2024 - Economic Assessment
item.description: OECD Economic Surveys: Egypt 2024 - Economic Assessment by Economics Department has an embargo on Friday 23 February 2024 at 11:00.

item.title: OECD Economic Surveys: Mexico 2024
item.description: OECD Economic Surveys: Mexico 2024 by Economics Department has an embargo on Tuesday 27 February 2024 at 11:00.

item.title: The Role of Guidelines in Fostering Competition Policy in Tunisia
item.description: The Role of Guidelines in Fostering Competition Policy in Tunisia by Directorate for Financial and Enterprise Affairs has an embargo on Wednesday 28 February 2024 at 8:00.

item.title: Government at a Glance: Latin America and the Caribbean 2024
item.description: Government at a Glance: Latin America and the Caribbean 2024 by Directorate for Public Governance has an embargo on Wednesday 13 March 2024 at 15:00.

item.title: Start-up Asia - Chasing the Innovation Frontier
item.description: Start-up Asia - Chasing the Innovation Frontier by Development Centre has an embargo on Thursday 20 June 2024 at 0:00.
